articles.title: Celtics rally from 22 down in Vucevic’s debut to beat Heat: 6 takeaways
articles.description:
Nikola Vucevic is going to help.

The post Celtics rally from 22 down in Vucevic’s debut to beat Heat: 6 takeaways appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics overcame a 22-point deficit to defeat the Heat on February 6.
Nikola Vucevic made his debut, contributing significantly to the team's performance.
This victory boosts Celtics' momentum as they aim for playoff positioning.
